CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 20, 1945, p. 23, reads: "RECEPTION - Mr. and Mrs. Gardner, who were married in Cumberland, Md., Sept. 29, was honored recently at a reception at the home of Mrs. Jane Worthy, of 2504 Chauncey Street. Those present at the reception were seated, left to right: Miss Mary Lee Gardner, Mr. and Mrs. Gardner, and Miss Betty Jane Gardner.  Standing left to right, are Thomas Sumpter, Mrs. Francis Owens, Mrs. Liza Brit, Mrs. Jane Worthy, Catherine Teasley, William Stevenson, Mrs. Sumpter, Mrs. Ruth Kennedy, Mrs. Solomon, Mrs. Ellen Peru and Mr. and Mrs. Thomas West, Jr. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. Gardner seated in center, with Mary Lee Gardner, Betty Jane Gardner wearing saddle shoes squatting beside them, and Thomas Sumpter, Francis Owens, Liza Brit, Jane Worthy, Catherine Teasley, William Stevenson, Mrs. Sumpter, Ruth Kennedy, Mrs. Solomon, Ellen Peru, and Mr. and Mrs. Thomas West, Jr., gathered in home of Jane Worthy at 2504 Chauncey Street in honor of the Gardner's wedding
